title: The future of AI
description: AI is shaping a future where intelligent systems not only augment human capabilities but also drive innovation across every industry, making once-impossible solutions a reality.

title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA's)
description: PWAs are web applications that take advantage of modern web capabilities to deliver a more native app-like experience. PWAs often leverage client-side rendering but can use SSR or SSG to improve performance and SEO.
